description: Buddhaland is a thriving community for indie hackers who prioritize autonomy and collaboration over venture capital. It supports creators, developers, and entrepreneurs in building impactful projects on their own terms through resources, mentorship, and networking events.
keywords: Buddhaland, indie hackers, community, entrepreneurship, creators, developers, autonomy, collaboration, success stories, mentorship, networking, events
title: Buddhaland: A Community for Indie Hackers
